full_threads.body:
Hi Shelly,

Hope you are doing well.

Yes, I have updated the navigation menu for the 1hr Online Speak With Impact.

Here's the link:
https://shellshockedmedia.com/

Let us know if you need further assistance.

Thanks Joel.

We'll go through this properly this week.

But any navigation should say 1hr Online Speak With Impact

The Making Virtual Meetings Work does not exist anymore

Thanks

Shelly Horton
0404 868 463
http://www.shellshockedmedia.com/
https://geni.us/ImYourPeriGodmother

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body: Hi @ricaR - looks no no time was tracked for these updates. Can you add?

@ricaR Can you please add the time

(Time: 30mins)
Apologies I misread. All good on screenshot 👍
Hey Joel - just confirming this was go live on monday?

Hi Shelly,

Hope you’re doing well!
Confirming that the site has been updated, here are the links for you to review:
  • Homepage
  • Who is this for?
  • 1hr Speak With Impact
  • Speak With Impact Online Course

We also noticed the table layout on the Courses page was a bit off, so we made a few small tweaks to clean it up.

To streamline navigation, we’ve set up the following redirects:
  • 1hr Online Course → now redirects to this page
  • Making Virtual Meetings Work → also redirects to 1hr Speak With Impact

Feel free to reach out if anything pops up or if you'd like to tweak anything further.
Hi team, is there an update we can send to the customer while we're finishing off?
Thanks team! Passing this to @ljD for the help in course page and product layout for non-logged in users.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to LJ De La Peña

full_threads.body:
@daphne I'm done making the changes.

Here are the links:
https://shellshockedmedia.com
https://shellshockedmedia.com/who-is-this-for/
https://shellshockedmedia.com/1hr-speak-with-impact/
https://shellshockedmedia.com/course/speak-with-impact-online-course/

I just need @joel help with the course page and product page layout for non-logged in users.

Hi @joel I'm done creating the course, the page and the product however, I need yoru help with the product page.

The layout should be like this for non-logged in users: https://shellshockedmedia.com/course/media-presentation-training-with-shelly-horton/

However, this is what I'm getting: https://shellshockedmedia.com/product/1hr-online-course-speak-with-impact/


And when I go to the course page the content are showing for non-logged in users as well: https://shellshockedmedia.com/course/speak-with-impact-online-course/ which should only display once they purchased the course.

@ricaR - any update on this? Customer said to make the updates Monday.

Thanks 🙏

full_threads.body:
Hi everyone,

Sending this now to get it off our to do list. But please take action on Monday not the weekend.

We've created a new online course! We want to remove Making Virtual Meetings Work and replace with the new Speak with Impact Online Course.

We're hoping you can simply slot these videos and written materials in.

There are changes on the home page, making virtual meetings work page and course and the "Who is this for" page. I've attached it in a Word doc too. Plus the transcripts.

Thanks

Shelly and Darren

HOME PAGE https://shellshockedmedia.com

How we can help

Replace Make Your Virtual Meetings Work with

Speak With Impact

Media training

Build Your Confidence

REPLACE THIS PAGE https://shellshockedmedia.com/making-virtual-meetings-work-with-shelly-horton/

Speak With Impact

1hr Online Course

Valued at $397 +GST

LET'S DO THIS - BUY NOW

0.0 SWI Video

https://vimeo.com/1100493803

SPEAK WITH IMPACT ONLINE COURSE

Ready to ditch the nerves and own the spotlight?

Whether you're speaking on camera, presenting on stage, or pitching to clients, the pressure to perform can feel overwhelming. That's where Speak with Impact comes in.

This online course is your shortcut to becoming a confident, clear and compelling communicator. Created by TV presenter and media expert Shelly Horton, it's packed with practical tools and insider tips to help you take control of your message and deliver it with confidence.

You'll discover how to manage nerves, craft stories that stick, engage your audience from the first word, and avoid the dreaded on-camera awkwardness. From wardrobe wins to body language hacks, lighting tricks to speaking with purpose - we cover it all.

And yes, you'll finally learn how to stop rambling and start owning the room - even when it's a virtual one.

Perfect for business owners, corporate leaders, influencers or anyone wanting to show up with confidence - this course will transform how you communicate.

It's time to step up and speak with impact. Because when you speak well, people listen.

WHO IS THIS FOR?

  • Business owners who are the face of their brand
  • Corporate teams who need to shine in meetings and presentations
  • Content creators, influencers and keynote speakers
  • Anyone sick of second-guessing themselves when speaking up

HOW LONG WILL IT TAKE?

· If you watch the course content in one hit it will take ONE HOUR.

· It's made up of short, sharp videos and written information.

· However, there's no right or wrong way to do this. Watch one chapter a week or a video a day. It's up to you.

COURSE OVERVIEW

CH1 Feeling the jitters?
Simple strategies to calm your nerves and speak with confidence.

CH2 Dress to impress
What to wear (and what to avoid) when you're in the spotlight.

CH3 Wait… what are you even going to say?
Craft a clear, confident message that actually lands.

CH4 It's not just what you say...

Body language tricks to help you look calm, clear and in control.

CH5 Handling heat with confidence.
Techniques for tackling tough feedback and staying in control.

CH6 Creating Content
Present and produce polished videos - no big budget needed.

CH7 Final boost. Big impact.
The last words you need to fire up your confidence before you go live.

LET'S DO THIS - BUY NOW

UPDATE https://shellshockedmedia.com/who-is-this-for/

Replace 1hr Making Virtual Meetings Work

1HR ONLINE SPEAK WITH IMPACT

You get: 21 easy-to-follow video modules that give you the tools to become confident, clear, and camera-ready - no experience needed.

Perfect for: Anyone who can't do the training in-person. Self-motivated professionals, regional voices with stories to tell, and anyone stepping in front of the camera for online content.

Actual course creation:

Vimeo links here and transcripts attached
